abstract: Editorial approves of Congressional commission's plan to reform Veterans Health Administration over next two decades; praises plan for its wariness of short term solutions, and for defending institution from critics who would outsource its services to private sector; acknowledges both necessity and challenge of integrating public and private resources to meet veteran's medical needs.
lead_paragraph: A commission has recommended a complex public-private partnership to help the department deliver medical care; it should proceed cautiously.

headline.main: Heal the V.A. (But First, Do No Harm)
headline.print_headline: Heal the V.A. (But First, Do No Harm)

snippet: A commission has recommended a complex public-private partnership to help the department deliver medical care; it should proceed cautiously....
